TopicTitle: Series Finale - Project Inquiry Compilation - Realistic stock mission to Duna

Articles.Content:
Project Inquiry

Realistic stock mission to Duna - Series Finale

Hello all. I'm a YouTuber and Streamer you may have spotted around KSP-TV or on the forums. It's been a pleasure bringing this series to the screen and I hope it's been entertaining for you as well. Now that this project is over, I can finally relax. I hope you enjoy.

Rate this thread if you like the series! It's one of the only ways I can get my creations out to you guys. Playing Kerbal is amazing in itself, but filming it and showing other fellow gamers is a different level of awesome.

I'll need to find something else to work on now... Later guys. Oh! And if you enjoyed, please stop by my YouTube channel or twitch stream in my signature. I've got more similar in both places.

Edited February 9, 2015 by Avera9eJoe

This seems amazing! Do you have a download?

- - - Updated - - -

Just finished the video, great job.
A craft download? I'll get you one as soon as I can.

A craft download? I'll get you one as soon as I can.

Thanks, you rarely see craft as useful and as good as that.

This is pretty good man!

There's nothing like the feeling you get from a big mission like this! Now I have an urge to make another one!

I liked the Austin Powers rover removal method!

Pretty good! Only why is everything so blurry?

Also, I suggest you use Astronomer's Visual pack for even more beautiful planets.

Pretty good! Only why is everything so blurry?

Also, I suggest you use Astronomer's Visual pack for even more beautiful planets.

Blurry? Are you running on 720? It's not blurry at all for me. As to Astronomers pack, I started using it halfway through when I bought a computer capable of running it. So I already am using it. Watch the last third to see it. Astronomers pack is beautiful.

Edited February 9, 2015 by Avera9eJoe

Here are all the crafts: Inquiry ships [0.90 BROKEN]

NOTE THAT ALL THE FUEL LINES ARE BROKEN! I'm not sure why but when I tested them in 0.90 the fuel lines detached.

EDIT: GAH double post sorry
Thanks for all the rep everyone. This video has just barely put me over 400, and has added my fifth green bar. Thank you.
